articles.title: S&P 500 declines as Big Tech falls before earnings, investors await trade deals: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Investors are looking to the busiest period of the first-quarter earnings season, which will see more than 180 S&P 500 companies report results.
articles.content:
The S&P 500 fell Monday amid a drop in shares of Big Tech names reporting earnings this week. Wall Street is also awaiting any progress on trade deal negotiations.

articles.title: iOS and Android juice jacking defenses have been trivial to bypass for years - Ars Technica
